title: Scalable Language Learning MOOC Design: Blended Pedagogy Integration

context.additional_context: Customized language courses to enhance global communication competencies within organizations, utilizing VR simulations to replicate language use in real work environments (e.g., video conferences, collaborative projects).

learning_goals: Learners can communicate with over 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments using workplace-related language expressions
Learners can autonomously manage their learning process by utilizing blended learning materials (videos, quizzes, discussion boards) provided on MOOC platforms at least three times weekly
Learners can reduce grammatical errors in business correspondence by over 50% within two weeks through peer feedback and AI evaluation systems
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
